input.sentences: mom wanted to start another crochet project .
mom 's last project was this blanket .
i surprised her with more yarn .
she had so many patterns to choose from .
she settled in this pattern and color and got started .
output.sentences: Grandma was going to crochet a blanket for every one of her grandchildren.
She had already made some, but she had more to make.
She got out her supply of yarn.
She used a color chart to help her decide which colors to combine.
She began another blanket in blue for her grandson, Jeremy.
